name: The Honorable Glenn B. Bronson
assigned: PA - Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas
bio:
The Hon. Glenn B. Bronson is a judge for the Philadelphia County Court of Common Pleas in Pennsylvania. He was elected to the bench in 2005 and re-elected in 2015.

Bronson attended the University of Pennsylvania, where he earned a B.S. (1975), an M.B.A. (1976), and an M.S. (1977). He then completed a J.D. at New York University School of Law in 1981.
